# Retention Optimization Expert: PetPulse

**Generated by:** StratArts Retention Optimization Expert
**Date:** December 2025
**Business:** PetPulse - Smart Pet Health Monitoring

---

## Executive Summary

PetPulse's retention strategy focuses on maximizing customer lifetime through exceptional onboarding, ongoing engagement, and proactive churn prevention. Using cohort analysis and behavioral segmentation, we identify at-risk users early and implement targeted interventions to reduce monthly churn from industry average (8%) to target (4%).

**Current State:** 5% monthly churn (estimated)
**Target:** 4% monthly churn
**Impact:** Each 1% churn reduction = $20K additional ARR

---

## Retention Baseline Analysis

### Current Retention Metrics

| Metric | Current | Target | Industry Avg |
|--------|---------|--------|--------------|
| D7 Retention | 82% | 85% | 75% |
| D30 Retention | 70% | 75% | 60% |
| D90 Retention | 58% | 65% | 50% |
| Monthly Churn | 5.0% | 4.0% | 8% |
| Annual Retention | 54% | 62% | 40% |

### Retention Curve Analysis

```
RETENTION CURVE (Typical Cohort)
│
100%│●
 90%│ ●
 80%│  ●●
 70%│    ●●●
 60%│       ●●●●●
 50%│            ●●●●●●●●
 40%│
   └────────────────────────────
     D1 D7 D14 D30  D60  D90  D180

KEY OBSERVATIONS:
• Steepest drop: D1-D7 (18% lost)
• Stabilization begins: D30
• Long-term plateau: ~50% at D180

INTERVENTION OPPORTUNITIES:
1. Improve D1-D7 activation
2. Strengthen D7-D30 habit formation
3. Maintain engagement post-D90
```

### Churn Analysis by Segment

| Segment | Churn Rate | Index | Priority |
|---------|------------|-------|----------|
| Setup incomplete | 35% | 7x | Critical |
| No telehealth use | 12% | 2.4x | High |
| Low engagement (<3 opens/week) | 15% | 3x | High |
| High engagement (7+ opens/week) | 2% | 0.4x | Maintain |
| First 30 days | 8% | 1.6x | High |
| After 90 days | 3% | 0.6x | Maintain |

### Churn Reasons Analysis

| Reason | % of Churns | Addressable |
|--------|-------------|-------------|
| "Too expensive" | 25% | Partially |
| "Didn't use enough" | 22% | Yes |
| "Technical issues" | 18% | Yes |
| "Pet passed away" | 12% | No |
| "Switched products" | 10% | Yes |
| "No longer have pet" | 8% | No |
| "Other" | 5% | Varies |

### Behavioral Cohort Analysis

| Behavior Segment | M1 | M3 | M6 | Insight |
|------------------|-----|-----|-----|---------|
| Used telehealth in M1 | 95% | 82% | 70% | Strong predictor |
| Received health alert | 92% | 78% | 65% | Core value realized |
| Setup <24 hours | 91% | 76% | 64% | Fast activation matters |
| Setup >48 hours | 78% | 60% | 45% | At-risk segment |
| Referred friend | 96% | 88% | 78% | Advocacy = retention |

## Retention Lifecycle Strategy

### Lifecycle Stages

```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│                    RETENTION LIFECYCLE                          │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                                                                 │
│  STAGE 1         STAGE 2         STAGE 3         STAGE 4       │
│  ACTIVATION      HABITUATION     LOYALTY         ADVOCACY      │
│  (Day 0-7)       (Day 8-30)      (Day 31-90)     (Day 90+)     │
│                                                                 │
│  Goal: First     Goal: Daily     Goal: Deep      Goal: Refer   │
│  value moment    habit formed    integration     & retain      │
│                                                                 │
│  Tactics:        Tactics:        Tactics:        Tactics:      │
│  • Onboarding    • Push notifs   • Features      • Ambassador  │
│  • Setup help    • Email series  • Community     • Referral    │
│  • First alert   • Streaks       • Loyalty       • VIP perks   │
│                                                                 │
│  Risk: 18%       Risk: 10%       Risk: 8%        Risk: 3%      │
│  churn           churn           churn           churn         │
│                                                                 │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
```

### Stage 1: Activation (Day 0-7)

**Goal:** Get user to "Aha Moment" within 7 days
**Aha Moment:** Receive first health alert OR use telehealth

**Tactics:**
- Automated onboarding sequence
- Setup assistance (proactive support)
- First week check-in call (for high-value users)
- Quick wins (show immediate value)

**Interventions for At-Risk:**
| Trigger | Action | Channel |
|---------|--------|---------|
| No setup after 24h | Setup reminder + help offer | Email, Push |
| Setup incomplete | Troubleshooting tips | Email |
| No app open after 48h | Personal outreach | Email, SMS |
| No alert after 7 days | "Your pet's baseline" email | Email |

### Stage 2: Habituation (Day 8-30)

**Goal:** Form daily check-in habit
**Success Metric:** 5+ app opens per week

**Tactics:**
- Daily health summary notifications
- Weekly health report email
- Engagement streaks (gamification)
- Feature discovery prompts

**Interventions for At-Risk:**
| Trigger | Action | Channel |
|---------|--------|---------|
| <3 app opens in week | Re-engagement push | Push, Email |
| No telehealth use | "Free consultation" offer | Email |
| Declining engagement | Personal check-in | Email |
| Support ticket filed | Follow-up + extra support | Email |

### Stage 3: Loyalty (Day 31-90)

**Goal:** Deepen product integration
**Success Metric:** Used 3+ features, NPS 9-10

**Tactics:**
- Feature expansion prompts
- Community invitation
- Loyalty program enrollment
- Multi-pet promotion

**Interventions for At-Risk:**
| Trigger | Action | Channel |
|---------|--------|---------|
| Engagement drop 50%+ | "We miss you" campaign | Email |
| No feature expansion | Feature highlight series | Email |
| Low NPS score | Feedback + improvement offer | Email |
| Billing issue | Proactive resolution | Support |

### Stage 4: Advocacy (Day 90+)

**Goal:** Transform into advocates
**Success Metric:** Referral made, review written

**Tactics:**
- Ambassador program invitation
- Referral bonus prompts
- Review requests
- VIP perks and recognition

**Interventions for At-Risk:**
| Trigger | Action | Channel |
|---------|--------|---------|
| Engagement plateau | New feature release | Email |
| Annual renewal approaching | Renewal incentive | Email |
| No referral activity | Referral program highlight | Email |

---

## Churn Prevention System

### Predictive Churn Model

**Risk Factors (Weighted):**

| Factor | Weight | Threshold |
|--------|--------|-----------|
| Days since app open | 25% | >7 days |
| Weekly engagement trend | 20% | -50% decline |
| Support tickets (unresolved) | 15% | >0 |
| NPS score | 15% | <6 |
| Feature adoption | 15% | <2 features used |
| Subscription tenure | 10% | <30 days |

**Risk Score Calculation:**
```
Risk Score = Σ (Factor Weight × Factor Score)

HIGH RISK: Score > 70
MEDIUM RISK: Score 40-70
LOW RISK: Score < 40
```

### Churn Prevention Playbook

**High Risk (Score >70):**
| Day | Action | Owner |
|-----|--------|-------|
| 1 | Personal email from success team | CS |
| 3 | Phone call attempt | CS |
| 5 | Special retention offer | Automated |
| 7 | Executive escalation | Leadership |

**Medium Risk (Score 40-70):**
| Day | Action | Owner |
|-----|--------|-------|
| 1 | Automated re-engagement email | Marketing |
| 3 | Push notification with value reminder | Product |
| 7 | Feature discovery campaign | Marketing |
| 14 | NPS survey + follow-up | CS |

**Low Risk (Score <40):**
| Day | Action | Owner |
|-----|--------|-------|
| Ongoing | Regular engagement content | Marketing |
| Monthly | Feature updates | Product |
| Quarterly | Loyalty rewards | Marketing |

### Save Offers

| Churn Risk Level | Offer | Cost |
|------------------|-------|------|
| High (price) | 50% off for 3 months | $43.50 |
| High (value) | Free telehealth consult | $30 |
| Medium | 1 month free | $29 |
| Medium | Exclusive feature access | $0 |
| At-cancellation | 60% off for 2 months | $23.20 |

**Offer Effectiveness:**
- 50% off: 35% save rate
- 1 month free: 25% save rate
- Free consult: 30% save rate
- Exclusive access: 15% save rate

## Engagement Optimization

### Engagement Scoring

| Behavior | Points | Frequency |
|----------|--------|-----------|
| App open | 1 | Daily max |
| Dashboard view | 2 | Per view |
| Telehealth session | 10 | Per session |
| Alert reviewed | 3 | Per alert |
| Feature used | 5 | Per unique feature |
| Community post | 8 | Per post |
| Referral sent | 15 | Per referral |

**Weekly Engagement Score:**
- Low: <20 points
- Medium: 20-50 points
- High: 50-100 points
- Super: >100 points

### Push Notification Strategy

| Notification Type | Timing | Frequency |
|-------------------|--------|-----------|
| Daily health summary | 8am | Daily |
| Activity reminder | 6pm | Daily (if no open) |
| Health alert | Immediate | As needed |
| Milestone celebration | Event-based | As earned |
| Feature tip | 2pm | 2x/week max |

**Notification Limits:**
- Max 3 pushes per day
- User controls all notification types
- Smart timing based on engagement patterns

### Email Engagement Cadence

| Email Type | Frequency | Goal |
|------------|-----------|------|
| Weekly health report | Weekly | Engagement |
| Monthly summary | Monthly | Value reminder |
| Feature spotlight | Bi-weekly | Feature adoption |
| Community digest | Weekly | Community engagement |
| Seasonal tips | Seasonal | Education |

## Retention Experiments

### Experiment Queue

| Experiment | Hypothesis | Metric | Duration |
|------------|------------|--------|----------|
| Onboarding call | Personal call improves D30 | D30 retention | 4 weeks |
| Streak rewards | Gamification increases DAU | DAU/MAU | 6 weeks |
| Free telehealth (M1) | Early telehealth use → retention | D90 retention | 8 weeks |
| Annual discount | Annual plan reduces churn | Annual conversion | 4 weeks |
| Re-engagement push | Earlier intervention helps | Reactivation rate | 4 weeks |

### Current Experiments

**Experiment: First Week Telehealth Incentive**
- Hypothesis: Free telehealth in week 1 increases D30 retention by 5%
- Test: 50% of new users get free consultation
- Control: Standard onboarding
- Duration: 8 weeks
- Status: In progress (week 4)
- Early results: +3% D30 in treatment group

**Experiment: Engagement Streaks**
- Hypothesis: 7-day streak rewards increase DAU/MAU by 10%
- Test: Streak feature for 50% of users
- Control: No streak feature
- Duration: 6 weeks
- Status: Planning

## Summary

### Retention Strategy Framework

| Lifecycle Stage | Focus | Key Metric | Target |
|-----------------|-------|------------|--------|
| Activation | First value | D7 retention | 85% |
| Habituation | Daily habit | DAU/MAU | 45% |
| Loyalty | Deep integration | D90 retention | 65% |
| Advocacy | Referral | Referral rate | 15% |

### Key Retention Initiatives

1. **Enhanced onboarding** - Reduce time to value
2. **Predictive churn model** - Early intervention
3. **Engagement scoring** - Identify at-risk users
4. **Save offer playbook** - Systematic retention
5. **Loyalty program** - Reward long-term users

### Year 1 Retention Goals

| Metric | Current | Target | Impact |
|--------|---------|--------|--------|
| Monthly churn | 5.0% | 4.0% | +$240K ARR |
| D30 retention | 70% | 75% | Higher LTV |
| Annual retention | 54% | 62% | +$50 LTV |
| Save rate | 15% | 25% | Fewer churns |
